com.ericramirezs.commando4j.command

Interface Slash

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HelpCommand, LanguageCommand, PingCommandExample, PrefixCommand

    public interface Slash
    Interface to handle command as Discord's slash commands. It tells the ICommandEngine that an implementation of ICommand should be also treated as a Slash command.

    Note: Implementing this in a class that doesn't implements ICommand will make this implementation meaningless.

    See Also:
    ICommand

        Check if the command should be run in the current Message Channel.
        Parameters:
        event - Discord Event that triggered this function call.
        command - Representation of a Slash Command as a ICommand.
        Returns:
        true if the command is compatible with the current Message Channel.
